snippet.title: RELEASE TRAILER (v1.1a) - (Ztar Attack 0.5) Mario Escape from the Jail
snippet.description:
And it is now out after about a month of work, but 2 days late due to real life stuff :P

Download (english only, too lazy to do French atm) : v1.0 https://drive.google.com/open?id=0BytKRU4E3kudNC0wREVscGFkYTQ
v1.1 https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BytKRU4E3kudby02ckV0aVhQWU0/view?usp=sharing
v1.1a https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BytKRU4E3kudbmg5WGdjRFR0SDQ/view?usp=sharing

This hack is a direct prequel to Ztar Attack, aka the upcoming major hack I am doing, hence the title. However it's okay if you don't put it, that's why i put it in brackets

It has 51 stars scattered in 5 main stages and a bunch of smaller levels. Difficulty is pretty close to Star Road, however if you're not that good with SM64 hacks you may have some trouble with some levels (Twin Arenas, final boss stage for example)

Original game by Nintendo, title screen by Mariocrash. More credits are ingame and in the readme.

Trailer music by Blake Robinson from The Synthtetic Orchestra - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j-81HaI4jio
